      • getNavigationTree

        protected java.util.List getNavigationTree(java.util.List items,
                               java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> ids,
                               int level,
                               com.dotmarketing.portlets.folders.business.FolderFactoryImpl.InternalCounter counter,
                               int depth,
                               com.liferay.portal.model.User user)
                                    throws DotDataException
        Gets the tree containing all the items in the list. If the item is a folder, gets the files and folders contained by the folder. It is executed recursively until reaching the depth specified. This method will change later
        Parameters:
        items -
        ids -
        level -
        counter -
        depth -
        Throws:
        DotDataException
